lore: A thief of moments in history, Trazyn takes to the battlefield to acquire that which cunning cannot secure. His Empathic Obliterator triggers psionic shock waves that kill not only his immediate victim, but those of a like mind nearby, while his ability to leap from one surrogate body to the next ensures he is hard to slay indeed.

otherAbilities.name: Ancient Collector
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, at the end of your Command phase , if that unit is within range of an objective marker you control, it remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at start or end of any turn.

otherAbilities.name: Surrogate Hosts
otherAbilities.description: At the start of your Command phase , if this model is on the battlefield, you can select one other friendly NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER model on the battlefield (excluding SKORPEKH LORD or EPIC HERO models). The selected model is destroyed (ignoring any rules that are triggered when a model is destroyed) and this model is put in its place, with all of its wounds remaining (if the selected model was leading a unit, this model now attaches to that unit as its Leader ).
